bibl.title: Report of the Yellow Fever Commission, by Carlos J. Finlay, April 11, 1901

div1.p: The Yellow Fever Commission examines potential cases of yellow fever at Morro 58. [Courtesy of the National Archives and Records Administration]

div1.head: Report of the Yellow Fever Commission, by Carlos J. Finlay, April 11, 1901
div1.opener:
No.
71
CIVIL DIVISION
DEPARTMENT OF CUBA
Rec'd 4-11 1901.
X
Headquarters Department of Cuba,
Received APR 13 1901
Havana, Cuba;
April 11th 1901.
CHAIRMAN
YELLOW FEVER COMMISSION
---888---
Report for April 11th.
----888----
OK
✓
71
M2
Headquarters Department of Cuba.
OFFICE OF CHIEF SANITARY OFFICER OF HAVANA
---------
LA MAESTRANZA
CALLE DE CUBA
ENTRE CUARTELES Y CHACON
------
Havana, Cuba, April 11th, 1901.
To the
Assistant Adjutant General,
In Charge of Civil Affairs,
Havana.
Sir:-
div1.p:
The Yellow Fever Commission met pursuant to the call of the
Chairman. Present - Doctors Finlay, Guiteras and Albertini.

The Board then proceeded to Morro 58 and examined:
Case 1, Senora de prol (Aurora Cid Alvares), and deferred the diag-
nosis.
